message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DM, cs.IT, cs.AI, cs.SI 

This paper deals with the problem of learning causal networks with interventions, which is a topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper also involves combinatorics and information theory, which are relevant to the sub-categories cs.DM and cs.IT. The use of adaptive algorithms and simulations suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-categories cs.AI and cs.SI. Overall, cs.LG is the most likely sub-category as it directly relates to the problem of learning causal graphs.
